description: This file defines a Java interface GateRepository that extends JpaRepository for managing GateEntity objects in a Spring Data JPA context. It includes a custom method to find gates by their gate code.

classes.name: GateRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for accessing GateEntity objects from the database, with a custom finder method based on gate code.

methods.name: findByGateCode
methods.description: Retrieves an Optional containing the GateEntity with the specified gate code, or empty if not found.
